name: Zelda: The Ultimate Trial
summary: Deep inside the Lost Woods lies a mysterious Stronghold, inhabited by lost travellers. As Link enters this place, he is greeted by Shiba, the protector of the fortress. He places the task of conquering the 3 Trials upon Link. He needs to meet new people and explore each corner of the Stronghold to be prepared, but will he be able to conquer them all and eventually reach the Ultimate Trial ?
